articles.title: Wall Street ends lower on worries over Georgia elections, virus surge - Economic Times
articles.description: The Dow, which touched a record high earlier in the session along with the S&P 500, was also dragged down by a more than 4% fall in Boeing Co's shares after Bernstein cut its rating to  underperform,  citing concerns about cash flow.
